U

unregisterUser(User) - Method in class librarySE.managers.UserManager
Removes a user from the system, enforcing all business constraints: User must not have the ADMIN role. User must have no unpaid fines. User must have no active (unreturned) borrow records.

User - Class in librarySE.managers
Represents a system user within the library management system.
User() - Constructor for class librarySE.managers.User
Default constructor used primarily for deserialization.
User(String, Role, String, String) - Constructor for class librarySE.managers.User
Creates a fully initialized user with validation.
USER - Enum constant in enum class librarySE.managers.Role
Standard user with borrowing and search privileges.
UserManager - Class in librarySE.managers
Manager responsible for all user-related operations within the library system.
UserRepository - Interface in librarySE.repo
Defines the contract for user persistence operations within the library system.
